body: Sure thing--it's a big palette, but the component is here: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/hiLZfGggQjP440aONPzyqiqN2s6Y8iyeMnjlo*S**DzFeO5XBiQxe*p25YS0Dyrxelowo2Ukhn2m5*JlItkNHhMziwvSkfm7/Clipboard01.png) and here is the link to the script: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/xgqpo64e5871m2i/Xmas%20_5.3.1.gh?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/xgqpo64e5871m2i/Xmas%20_5.3.1.gh?dl=0) thanks! I'm interested to know if you find anything. (Maybe simply my own error in how I'm trying to use it, right?) Best, Nick.
